name: amegmen
description: AMegMen (Accessible MegaMenu) is an Keyboard accessible, jQuery-free and Framework-free MegaMenu plugin which is fully responsive, and supports multiple levels.

scripts.compile:sasswatch: npm run compile:sass && node-sass --source-map true src/amegmen/ -wo dist/styles/amegmen
scripts.only:js: npm run compile:ts && npm run uglify:js
scripts.only:css: npm run compile:sass && npm run uglify:css
scripts.build:dev: npm run compile:ts && npm run compile:sass
scripts.build:prod: npm run build:dev && npm run uglify:js && npm run uglify:css && npm run compile:sitesass
scripts.compile:sitesass: node-sass src/sass-site/ -o dist/styles/site && uglifycss dist/styles/site/index.css --output dist/styles/site/index.min.css

author: https://github.com/adityakahb
